prev.title: Outbound SMS: Viewing the Performance of a Outbound SMS Campaign

next.title: Voice: Interacting with a Voice Campaign

title: Outbound SMS: Interacting With a Sent Outbound SMS Campaign
body:
Outbound SMS: Interacting With a Sent Outbound SMS Campaign¶

Once your outbound SMS campaign has been sent, you may perform the following actions.
You will need to have navigated to the desired outbound SMS campaign to follow the steps below.

  1. Click and click Resend Campaign

    • Curate the list of recipients of the outbound SMS campaign under To (options detailed here)

    • You can opt to Schedule Delivery instead of the default option to Send Immediately by selecting a date and entering a time

    • Click Resend

  2. Click and click Delete Campaign

    • Click Yes

    • Note that in addition to your outbound sms campaign, all associated workflows and performance data will be deleted

  3. Click View Workflow to view your outbound SMS campaign workflow
